snippet.title: Scrap Mechanic - Survival Trailer
snippet.description:
Survival is coming to Scrap Mechanic on 7th May!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/387990

Tool up and enter the creative paradise of Scrap Mechanic! Build fantastic machines, go on adventures with your friends and defend against evil farming bots in this imaginative multiplayer survival sandbox. With Scrap Mechanic’s powerful creation tools you can engineer your own adventures!

In Survival Mode mechanics explore a randomly generated open-world environment filled with enemies, treasure and dangerous robots! Team up with friends and build bases to protect yourself and your valuables. The most creative will survive!

Music by - Zheanna Erose

http://www.scrapmechanic.com
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/scrapmechanic
Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/scrapmechanic
